message: [takes a step back] What.. is.. that? It can't be? No. Let me look at it.

message: It has all the markings. But it can't be? I don't understand.

message: This thing that you have stumbled upon, my friend. This is the Xul'viir. A most foul item indeed.

message: It would seem that either he, or the stories have not been telling the truth.

message: Sigh. You don't know what you are getting yourself into, kid.
